Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 2.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
Kusalattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
216.
716Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā…  napurejātapaccayā—  arūpe kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe saṃsaṭṭhā dve khandhā. Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ…pe…  abyākataṃ dhammaṃ…pe… .
<< Nahetuup Napacchājāta-naāsevana >>
